field.name: description
field.value: Updated the template engine site doco and also included an example

comment.author: gauthier
comment.text:
there is a case typo @88: FirstName should be Firstname
also @75 you could add a "Console.WriteLine(emailBody);" to make the sample 100% MSDN doc compliant
Thanks you for adding to the documentation :)

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text:
Patch update as per Gauthier comment.
Cheers John

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: John, did you miss Gauthier's second comment, or was that deliberate?

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text: I'm not too sure what he means by the second comment. Do you get it? The sample is now, as far as I can, good.

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: I think Gauthier is saying to write out the email body to the console because it is a console app, and the whole point of the sample is to see the email body being processed.

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text: I haven't got the time to submit another patch right now, could you please change it so it writes out. Thanks
